Class Property

java.lang.Object
Property
public class Property
extends java.lang.Object
A class to represent and store data on a property in the system.

  • Constructor Details

    • Property

      public Property()
      The default constructor.

    • Property

      public Property​(java.lang.String owner, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String postcode, double estMarketValue, int category, boolean principalResidence)
      Parameters:
      owner - The owner of the property.
      address - The address of the property.
      postcode - The postcode of the property.
      estMarketValue - The estimated market value of the property.
      category - The category, 0-4, that determines the location of the property (Countryside, City, etc.)
      principalResidence - Whether or not this is the owner's principal private residence.
